title: Centauri Twilight
description: Lara Danexx suffered years of torment at the hands of the evil and twisted Ranzon Slavarien. Victory is within her grasp when an unwelcome intruder hunts her down and spins wild tales of her lost family and royal blood.General Anton Coridian gave his word that he would find his beloved queenâ€™s long lost sister. Now he must convince Lara that his love can save not just her life, but her love.
author: Cynthia Woolf
